data.name: Elemgate Demo
data.detailed_description:
This demo showcases the first 3 levels of Elemgate.
In practice mode you can access some 10 stages from levels 4, 5 and 6 for a sneak peak at how these levels will be a fun challenge.
data.about_the_game:
This demo showcases the first 3 levels of Elemgate.
In practice mode you can access some 10 stages from levels 4, 5 and 6 for a sneak peak at how these levels will be a fun challenge.
data.short_description: To complete the demo you will need to beat the first 3 levels on hard difficulty, shouldn't be to hard right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6300HQ / AMD Ryzen 5 3550H or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB /AMD R9 290X 4GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
